=Description=
The Achievement System is a record of your characters personal achievements. There are many, many achievements that can be found from things as simple as discovering a town to things as difficult as taming every animal. The achievements cover almost every facet of Ultima and are categorized by:
* General - Account and player achievements
* Crafting - Crafting specific items or reaching a number of items
* Skills - Completing or using skills
* Player vs Environment - Completing a number of kills for a specific monster or situation
* Player vs Player - Combat involving other players
* Atlas - Exploring the world

==How to Access==
To access the Achievements Menu, simply click to yourself or another player to bring up the [[Context_Menu]] and select "View Achievements":
<gallery mode="nolines">
File:AchievementsContextMenuSelf.PNG|Context Menu used on your own character. This can be done by single clicking yourself, unless you have changed this operation in the Options Menu.
File:AchievementsContextMenuOther.PNG|Context Menu used on someone else's character. This can be done by single clicking the character, unless you have changed this operation in the Options Menu.
</gallery>

==Rewards==
Most achievements will provide some sort of reward, and some of them will give rewards for completing the achievement multiple times with increasing requirements. Rewards are placed into the players bank and are commonly one of or more of the following:
* Gold
* [[Titles_and_Hues_Guide#Custom_Titles|Title and Title Hue Scrolls]]
* Decorations and Deeds
